description:
This in-depth tutorial covers everything you need to know about creating foliage! We’ll show how to make realistic looking grass, branches, and a full tree from the ground up! Then, we'll head into UDK and setup a master shader with parameters that can be easily tweaked, as well as make your leaves and grass move in the wind! If you've ever wanted to master the ins-and-outs of creating foliage for your games, this is the course for you!

 

About the Instructor:

Damian Lazarski has been working in the games industry since graduating from a Games Design course at Northumbria University in 2012. He is currently working as a Junior Artist at Crytek UK.
title: Building Foliage for Games using 3ds Max and UDK
